account_id.title: Account ID
account_id.description: Numeric LinkedIn Ads account identifier (without the urn prefix).

access_token.title: Access Token
access_token.description: OAuth access token with r_ads_reporting scope.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: UTC date to begin incremental collection (YYYY-MM-DD).

lookback_window_days.title: Lookback Window
lookback_window_days.description: Days to subtract from the last synced date when constructing incremental slices.

slice_span_days.title: Slice Span
slice_span_days.description: Number of days to request per API call.

page_size.title: Page Size
page_size.description: Number of rows to request per page from the analytics endpoint.

time_granularity.title: Time Granularity
time_granularity.description: Aggregation granularity for the analytics export.

timezone.title: Timezone
timezone.description: Timezone used to anchor the reporting window.
